member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.DeEditorToolsUtils.FindAllComponentsOfType``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns all components of type T in the currently open scene/s, or NULL if none could be found.
This is a more efficient version of DeEditorUtils.FindAllComponentsOfType.
member.param: If TRUE only finds them in the active scene, otherwise in all loaded scenes

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.DeEditorToolsUtils.FindFirstComponentOfType``1(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the first of type T in the currently open scene/s, or NULL if none could be found.
member.param: If TRUE only finds it in the active scene, otherwise in all loaded scenes

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.DeEditorToolsUtils.CaptureGameViewScreenshot(System.Int32,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Camera,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Captures a screenshot of the gameView from the given camera, and returns it as a Texture2D object
member.param: If NULL uses the main camera

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.StoreItemColor(System.String,DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.HColor)
member.summary: If the item exists sets it, otherwise first creates it and then sets it

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.StoreItemIcon(System.String,DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.IcoType)
member.summary: If the item exists sets it, otherwise first creates it and then sets it

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.RemoveItemData(System.String)
member.summary: Returns TRUE if the item existed and was removed.

member.name: M:DG.DeEditorTools.Project.DeProjectData.GetItem(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the customizedItem for the given gameObject, or NULL if none was found

member.name: T:DG.DeEditorTools.Scene.DeScene
member.summary: Adds extra features to the Scene panel (like right-click).
